snippet: Two women remained hospitalized but in good condition today after a string of crashes on fog-shrouded Interstate 15 that injured 17 people.    Fifteen people were treated for minor injuries in the Saturday morning accidents. In all, 22 vehicles we...
lead_paragraph: Two women remained hospitalized but in good condition today after a string of crashes on fog-shrouded Interstate 15 that injured 17 people. Fifteen people were treated for minor injuries in the Saturday morning accidents. In all, 22 vehicles were involved, including a truck hauling 8 cars, a truck hauling a horse trailer and another towing a boat, the California Highway Patrol said.
abstract: Fog causes string of automobile accidents on Interstate 15 in Calif, injuring 17 people (S)

headline.main: National News Briefs; Fog Blamed in Chain Of California Crashes
